name: 3ev/tev_mailchimp
description: Mailchimp integration for your TYPO3 site

suggest.3ev/typo3-utils: Required but must be included in your root composer.json due to TYPO3 bug. See require-dev for version
suggest.danielstjules/stringy: Required but must be included in your root composer.json due to TYPO3 bug. See require-dev for version
suggest.pacely/mailchimp-apiv3: Required but must be included in your root composer.json due to TYPO3 bug. See require-dev for version
suggest.nesbot/carbon: Required but must be included in your root composer.json due to TYPO3 bug. See require-dev for version
